title: Best Video Editor to Upgrade From iMovie
content:
Selecting a new editing software may seem like a daunting task. With countless choices, tiered packages and limited free trials, you may feel frustrated and overwhelmed even before you make the initial investment.

Introducing PowerDirector for Mac

It’s designed to streamline your workflow, freeing more time to focus on your creative process and turn your ideas and vision into commanding videos.

Advantages:
